app.name: FundingIntel
app.title: FundingIntel - Multilingual Startup Funding Intelligence Platform

landing.hero_description: Stop letting language barriers limit your growth. Discover investors, policies, and grants in Hindi, Tamil, Telugu, and more with AI-powered precision.
landing.why_subtitle: Bridge the gap between your startup and global opportunities with our AI-driven platform designed for the diverse Indian ecosystem.
landing.problem_description: Funding information is currently fragmented across hundreds of sites and primarily available only in English, excluding millions of innovators from tier-2 and tier-3 cities.
landing.solution_description: We aggregate global data and use advanced AI to translate, summarize, and match opportunities in your native language, instantly. Democratizing access to capital.
landing.capabilities_subtitle: Everything you need to secure funding, accessible in your language.
landing.multilingual_description: Search global databases using Hindi, Tamil, Telugu, and more. Our engine understands context across languages.
landing.ai_description: Get plain-language explanations of complex funding terms and recommendations tailored to your startup stage.
landing.investor_description: Discover investors aligned with your sector, stage, and geography‚Äîfiltered by past investments and focus areas.
landing.policy_description: Stay updated on government schemes, grants, and tax benefits specifically relevant to your business.
landing.trend_description: Understand market dynamics with visualizations of sector-wise funding trends and regional insights.
landing.experience_description: Ask questions in your local language and get accurate, data-backed answers immediately. Our platform breaks down the walls between your idea and the funding it deserves.
landing.experience_feature_1: Real-time translation of queries and results
landing.experience_feature_2: Context-aware answers based on latest government policies
landing.experience_feature_3: Export reports in PDF in your preferred language
landing.cta_description: Using our multilingual engine to discover opportunities across 40+ markets.

dashboard.welcome_message: Here's your personalized funding intelligence dashboard
dashboard.start_exploring: Start exploring to see your activity here
dashboard.explore_investors_desc: Find VCs matching your sector & stage

intelligence.title: AI Funding Intelligence
intelligence.subtitle: Ask any funding-related question in your language and get AI-powered answers
intelligence.placeholder: e.g., What are the best investors for SaaS startups in Bangalore?
intelligence.query_placeholder: How can I get seed funding for an AgriTech startup building drone solutions for farmers in Karnataka?

investors.title: Investor Discovery
investors.subtitle: Find and connect with investors aligned with your startup
investors.access_data: Access data on 5,000+ active investors matching your unique criteria.
investors.search_firm_placeholder: Search by firm name, partner, or thesis keyword...
investors.name: Name

trends.title: Funding Trends & Insights
trends.subtitle: Data-driven insights into Indian startup ecosystem
trends.sector_insight: In 2024, HealthTech funding increased by 32% in South India, driven by telemedicine and diagnostics innovation. FinTech continues to lead with 45% growth, particularly in payment solutions and lending tech.
trends.regional_insight: Bangalore and Hyderabad dominate South India with 42% of total funding. Emerging tech hubs like Pune and Ahmedabad are showing 25%+ growth.

policies.title: Government Policies & Schemes
policies.subtitle: Discover startup schemes and grants from central and state governments

profile.title: Profile & Preferences
profile.subtitle: Personalize your funding intelligence experience
profile.language_hint: This will be used for AI recommendations and translations

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Manage your account preferences and settings
settings.appearance_desc: Customize how FundingIntel looks for you
settings.theme_desc: Choose between light and dark theme
settings.language_settings_desc: Set your preferred language for the platform
settings.display_language_desc: Choose your preferred language for interface and AI responses
settings.push_notifications_desc: Receive notifications about new funding opportunities
settings.email_updates_desc: Get weekly digest of funding trends and insights
settings.enable_2fa_desc: Add an extra layer of security to your account
settings.delete_account_desc: Permanently delete your account and all data
settings.documentation_desc: Learn how to use FundingIntel effectively
settings.contact_support_desc: Get help from our support team

auth.welcome_subtitle: Access your startup funding intelligence dashboard.
auth.join_subtitle: Unlock global funding insights and connect with capital across 50+ markets.
auth.otp_message: We'll send a one-time password to your email address.
auth.terms_agreement_suffix: , and I consent to receiving market intelligence updates.
auth.sidebar_description: Join over 5,000 investors and startups using our multilingual engine to discover opportunities across 40+ markets.

footer.description: Democratizing access to startup funding intelligence across languages and regions.
